name: Travel to the restaurant at the edge of the universe
name_original: Travel to the restaurant at the edge of the universe
description:
There's a restaurant at the edge of the universe - and your reservation is in a few years already!

Use your FTL drives to get there as quickly as possible. Your crew of clones will keep everything going - probably. But watch out. They do need food. And the whole oxygen thing as well. Good thing they can upgrade your ship (hopefully) with the resources you collect along the way.

And do watch for space Krakens.

Known issues:

  • automatic food production ignores maximum food
  • very low chance for  ground missions being successful
